HttpRequestInfo.Name: GetResponseFromHotel
HttpRequestInfo.RequestParameters: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <Request xmlns="http://tempuri.org/"> <requestXML><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0"?> <Request> <Header UserID="110260" RequestID="244331a9-767e-4197-b3af-0b5ef033d34f" RequestType="Hotel.OrderConfirm.GetResponseFromHotelRequest" ClientIP="10.2.8.12" AsyncRequest="false" Timeout="0" MessagePriority="3" AssemblyVersion="2.9.5.0" RequestBodySize="0" SerializeMode="Xml" RouteStep="1" Environment="fat2" UseMemoryQ="false" /> <GetResponseFromHotelRequest> <OrderSendID>2170048163</OrderSendID> <OrderID>2170048163</OrderID> <!--更新者--> <Updatetor /> <!--发送类型,New:新订, Modify:修改, Cancel:取消--> <OperationType>New</OperationType> <!--发送状态, 0:酒店确认中,1:酒店确认成功,2:酒店确认失败,3:酒店确认拒绝,4:其他--> <SendStatus>1</SendStatus> <!--酒店确认号(可能包含多个ConfirmNo，| 分隔)--> <ConfirmNo /> <!--原因 1:酒店满房, 2:备注不接受, 3:价格错误, 4:日期超界, 5:已入住不允许取消修改, 6:已过最晚取消修改时间, 7:修改/取消订单不存在, 8:程序错误, 9:网络问题, 10:无房类信息, 11:房量不足--> <ReturnCode /> <!--酒店手工回复内容--> <ReturnDescript /> </GetResponseFromHotelRequest> </Request>]]> </requestXML> </Request> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
HttpRequestInfo.Remarks: 携程酒店《-酒店供应商（比如如家，汉庭） 该单预订状态

HttpRequestInfo.Name: SetFaxToHotel
HttpRequestInfo.RequestParameters: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <Request xmlns="http://tempuri.org/"> <requestXML><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0"?> <Request> <Header UserID="110260" RequestID="244331a9-767e-4197-b3af-0b5ef033d34f" RequestType="Hotel.OrderConfirm.SetFaxToHotelRequest" ClientIP="10.2.8.12" AsyncRequest="false" Timeout="0" MessagePriority="3" AssemblyVersion="2.9.5.0" RequestBodySize="0" SerializeMode="Xml" RouteStep="1" Environment="fat2" UseMemoryQ="false" /> <SetFaxToHotelRequest> <OrderID>2142134</OrderID> <Operator>E</Operator> <Eid>XXX</Eid> <SendTo>YYY</SendTo> <FaxNo>12345678</FaxNo> <CompanyName>Beijing</CompanyName> <Subject>Notice</Subject> <Body>ABDCDEHJGKJKWHjk</Body> <Priority>0</Priority>----传真重要性 <CoverPage>1</CoverPage>----传真类型 <Hotel>625</Hotel> </SetFaxToHotelRequest> </Request> </Request>]]> </requestXML> </Request> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
HttpRequestInfo.Remarks: 携程给酒店发传真接口
